org.apache.ddlutils.dynabean
Class SqlDynaClass

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.commons.beanutils.BasicDynaClass
      org.apache.ddlutils.dynabean.SqlDynaClass
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, DynaClass
public class SqlDynaClass
extends BasicDynaClass

SqlDynaClass is a DynaClass which is associated with a persistent Table in a Database.

Version:
$Revision: 630717 $
See Also:
